apps.name: charmie-bot
apps._note1: We specify this option to `false` to prevent the process from restarting when we kill it from the code.
apps._note2: We set this option to accomodate for people hosting on Windows since it doesn't support system signals.
apps._note3: We set kill_timeout to a ridiculously high value to prevent the process from being killed before cleanup operations are completed.
apps._note4: In the unlikely event that cleanup operations are not completed by this time the process will forcefully be killed and the messages that remained in the cache queue would be lost.
